metadata.synopsis: Teenage swordsman Hai Ge (Gao Wei) arrives at a walled-off Chinese desert outpost called Double Flag Town, where his bride-to-be, Hao Mei (Zhao Mana), awaits. This is an arranged marriage, and Hao Mei is skeptical until Hai Ge fights off a band of thugs trying to rape her. But the wedding is thrown into jeopardy when lethal swordsman Vidasoxian (Sun Haiying) claims Hao Mei for himself. A rivalry ensues, a bloodbath appears imminent and Hai Ge's formidable martial arts skills are put to the test.

reviews: As a stripped-back, 90-minute genre piece, it is enormously watchable and effective.
